mdRecord.dcterms:title: French Cathedral at New Orleans, ca.1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph portrays a French cathedral at New Orleans, Louisiana, ca 1893. Two young girls are seen walking in foreground. Three women are behind them with backs to the camera, and cathedral is seen in the center background. Image faded to yellowish brown with a less faded part at left. Heavy marks are in lower center and finger prints are in lower left and upper center
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
